title: Manchester City beat Inter Milan to win first Champions League
description: Manchester City win the first Champions League in their history and secure the treble by beating Inter Milan 1-0.

title: Dozens dead as heavy rains hit Pakistan
description: Hail and heavy rain pounded Bannu, Lakki Marwat, and Karak districts of the northwest Khyber Pakhtunkhwa province.

title: What does Russia’s exit from CFE mean for global arms control?
description: Unravelling treaty on Conventional Armed Forces in Europe is latest sign of escalating tension between NATO and Russia.

title: Donald Trump makes first public appearances since indictment
description: Ex-president expected to use speeches at two state party conventions to rail against the allegations.

title: Nord Stream sabotage probe turns to clues in Poland: Report
description: Investigators reconstructed the two-week voyage of a 15-metre yacht suspected of being involved in the sabotage.

title: ‘Unabomber’ dies in US prison at age 81
description: Theodore Kaczynski committed 16 bombings from 1978 and 1995, killing 3 and permanently maiming several of his victims.

title: Fourteen people killed in Kazakhstan forest fires
description: Kazakh President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev sacked emergency situations minister Yury Ilyin on Saturday.

title: Guatemala releases military officials convicted of grave crimes
description: The men were previously sentenced to between 33 and 58 years in prison for crimes against humanity.

title: Germany’s anti-Palestinianism is escalating
description: It is high time Germany stops conflating Palestinian activism with anti-Semitism in an attempt to atone for its past.

title: UK politics reels from ex-PM Johnson’s shock exit
description: Johnson, who has been under investigation over 'Partygate', says his opponents were 'determined to drive me out'.

title: France knife attack suspect charged with attempted murder
description: Abdalmasih H is refusing to speak about the motives behind his attack on children in the French Alpine town of Annecy.

title: Philippines evacuates thousands after Mayon volcano rumbles
description: More than 6,000 villagers forced to evacuate from near the Mayon volcano's crater in northeastern Albay province.

title: Ukraine claims gains near Bakhmut as battle rages in east
description: Russia says Ukraine has started a long-expected counteroffensive but denies Kyiv made gains along the front lines.

title: Deadly blast rocks explosives factory in Turkey’s capital
description: At least five workers have been killed in explosion at the MKE Rocket and Explosives Factory outside Ankara.

title: The AI apocalypse: Imminent risk or misdirection?
description: As tech bosses raise the doomsday alarm, others say it’s a distraction from AI’s real, less sensational dangers.

title: Sudan’s 24-hour truce begins amid dire humanitarian situation
description: Aid agencies are hoping to act during the ceasefire but will need a guarantee of safe passage from warring sides.

title: ‘Collective punishment’: Israel demolishes Palestinian homes
description: Israel's policy of demolishing the family homes of Palestinians accused of attacking Israelis considered a war crime.

title: How will Saudi Arabia’s oil output cut affect prices?
description: Saudi Arabia goes it alone in cutting oil production by one million barrels a day starting in July.

title: Can Trump run for president after indictment?
description: Neither the indictment itself nor a conviction would prevent the ex-US president from running for 2024 election.

title: Pakistan’s FM: ‘We’re at the fork in the road towards democracy’
description: Foreign Minister Bilawal Bhutto Zardari discusses the formidable challenges facing Pakistan.

title: Colombian gang leaders announce talks to address urban violence
description: Colombia’s government seeks to draw urban criminal networks into disarmament talks as it pursues 'total peace'.

title: Discarded mortar detonates killing more than 20 in Somalia: Media
description: Local official says unexploded mortar detonated near to where mostly children - aged between 10 and 15 - were playing.

title: Putin claims Russian forces thwarting Ukrainian counteroffensive
description: Claims by pro-Moscow commentators that Ukraine's counteroffensive has failed are premature, says war monitor think tank.

title: Four children found in Colombian jungle 40 days after plane crash
description: Colombia's military found the four children aged 13, 9 , 4, and 12-month-old, who survived plane crash on May 1.

title: Russia-Ukraine war: List of key events, day 472
description: As the war enters its 472nd day, these are the main developments.

title: Canadian appointee investigating China election claims steps down
description: Former Governor General David Johnston says the atmosphere has become too partisan to continue his work.

title: Trump indictment details plot to hide sensitive documents
description: Trump has been charged with 37 felony counts for keeping and hiding documents with sensitive national security content.
